item.description:
Week 3 of our Kaleidoscope Series sponsored by Bay Path College.

Growing Your Business from the Inside Out
Tuesday, October 11th, 7:00 PM

Speakers: Lucy Lewis, Freelance Technical Writer
Becky Castro, Certified Business & Personal Coach

How do you move a customer from “I’m interested…” to “Here’s my credit card?” Where do I start so I have enough clients? What is the difference between marketing and sales? Learn the techniques that empower a business owner to manage their business effectively, regardless of where it is in the business growth cycle. Get inspired and motivated with practical advice to increase your revenues and profits.
item.name: Growing Your Business from the Inside Out
